name: Marbleground Construct
description:
Marbleground Construct is a colorful 3D puzzle platformer where you can place different objects into a playfield to help your marble reach the end of the level. Complete a set of pre-build puzzles or create your own path!

Our Features:

  • Difficulty-based objectives;
  • Movement altering object;
  • Drag & drop inventory;
  • Interactable environment;
  • Marble physics.

Controls:


Marbleground Construct was an 8-week project made by 8 first-year students at Breda University of Applied Sciences in 2019.

Download Instructions:

  • Download MarblegroundContstruct.zip;
  • Unzip it somewhere in your PC;
  • Locate Team12MarbleGround.exe inside the WindowsNoEditor folder;
  • Click Team12MarbleGround.exe to play the game!
